name: Morning Routine
description: Step-by-step morning routine for ADHD management.
content: Review today's intentions and top 3 priorities.
Do a 2-minute body scan or mindfulness check.
Review coping scripts and strategies for the day.

name: Task Switching
description: Strategies for smooth transitions between tasks.
content: Set a 2-minute timer for transition breaks.
Write down the next task before leaving the current one.
Do a quick physical reset: stand, stretch, deep breath.
Use a visual cue (sticky note, phone alarm) for new task start.

name: Emotional Regulation
content: Pause and name the emotion you're feeling.
If overwhelmed, step outside or change rooms for 2 minutes.

name: PM Wind Down
description: Evening routine for better sleep and calm.
content: Set a phone alarm for wind-down time.
Dim lights and reduce screen time 1 hour before bed.
Do a 5-minute reflection or gratitude journal.
